nodes.text: In 17 ABY, a man was present in the Crystal Jewel casino on Coruscant, the galactic capital, when a nearby explosion rocked the gambling hall. The casino sustained damage, and, believing it signified an attack on the capital, many casino patrons fled the premises. Once outside, the man conversed with a Gotal and a Human over the possible location of the explosion; in actuality, the nearby Senate Hall. The man appeared familiar to the Human, Han Solo.
Kristine Kathryn Rusch created this individual for her novel, The New Rebellion, published by Bantam Spectra in 1996.
